text: Hey Boss... have you ever actually tried solving problems with humane methods? Negotiations, compromises, that kind of thing?
Humane methods? In our business, that's called 'prolonging the agony'. Sometimes the only humane method is to finish the job quickly and efficiently.
But can't we at least try? Maybe some debtors just don't understand the situation...
Izzy, I've seen enough to know that when it comes to debts, understanding only comes after a demonstration of power.
